name: Reflection (itch) (Astroplxnts)
description:
Talk to an entity about your life before you die. Find out why you died and understand why it happened. Reflect on the life you had as you pass on. 

This is a  linear kinetic novel.  There is only one ending and no choices. It's like a short story!

This is the first visual novel/game I have ever created. There may be mistakes/typos I have missed!

Created for the O2A2 Jam 2021!

  • <1000 words
  • 1 sprite
  • 1 background
  • 1 music track

Credits:

Made in Ren'y.

Art, Writing,  and Coding  by  Astroplxnts (me)

Music by PeriTune

 Anything not working, feel free to comment about it below!!

Thank you so much for playing!
